00022 class SoundObtainer : public ObjectObtainer {
00023     typedef ObjectObtainer Base;
00024 
00025     public:
00027         SoundObtainer();
00028 
00030         SoundObtainer(Sound* sound, BOOLEAN disposable);
00031 
00032         // needed because of a bug in the tasking-compiler

00034 
00036         virtual ~SoundObtainer();
00037 
00039         Sound* GetSound() { return (Sound*)GetObject(); }
00040 
00042         const Sound* GetSound() const { return (Sound*)GetObject(); }
00043 };
